Its simply awesome!!  Previously i used to have atleast 20 hair falls a day!  And now i have at most 5!  Use it with dove conditioner for best results.  First shampoo lavishly, and wash off. again take a little amount and shampoo again. this time it will lather lavishly. Leave it on for10 minutes. I know this might be tiresome, but you can do other things like brushing and scrubbing in the mean while.  This is because the first time you shampoo, you're removing dirt from your hair. And the next time you're actually shampooing it.  Then use the conditioner and leave it on for 15 minutes. It gives the best results.  I have consulted my dermatologist for leaving the conditioner for a long time and he said that there is no harm in it, it actually deep conditions your hair,

3~R2BT3PBUEN6XMN~B008KH5U28~L'Oreal Paris Fall Resist 3X Anti-hair Fall Shampoo, 360ml~2017-04-24~2.0 out of 5 stars~True~Aragrawa~http://www.amazon.in/gp/customer-reviews/R2BT3PBUEN6XMN/ref=cm_cr_arp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&ASIN=B008KH5U28~Shampoo very runny, possibly siphoned off and diluted with water.~I am writing this review with utter disappointment. Two reasons:1.)  The MRP posted on Amazon was 275/-, however the MRP print on the product is 245/-. I do not seem to understand this misleading behavior2.) I read a report last year that FMCG dealers and distributors had been siphoning off product to an extent of 15-20% (even diluting with water in case of products like shampoo to conceal missing volume). The bottle that I received has shampoo that was very runny and having read that report, I am confident that I received product that isn't what it is supposed to be. I wanted to return it, but unfortunately all beauty products are non-returnable.There is no way I am ordering any skin or hair care products from Amazon anymore.

For hair fall issue, I have found, serums, lotions, and oils are the best solution as they tend to stay on your scalp for longer to work their magic. So if you're looking for a shampoo that prevents hair fall due to breakage and dryness or one that cause lesser hair fall, go for this one!

It was a bad idea. This did clean my scalp of all the junk and oil and sebum etc but at the same time it gave me dandruff and caused massive hair loss from the roots. I'm not sure what went wrong exactly because it is just a shampoo but i have never experienced anything like this before with any shampoo before. I continued to wash my hair with this for 15 days thinking my hair would adapt to it, but that made things worse. Now i was losing hair faster and My dandruff had taken the worst form. I had to rush to the pharmacy and buy a medicated anti dandruff shampoo which then calmed my scalp down and then i retired to the previous shampoo that i had been using. Garnier ultra blends recitalising shampoo (the 5 herbs one) much better and my hair fall has siezed completely. I will not experiment with this brand EVER again.

I have dry hair but it fails to restore or retain moisture level after wash but this can be tackled by using any conditioner.I purchased it for Rs 207 which is cheaper than local store and I saved myself hassle of walking into a physical store and spend 20 minutes to at checkout.
